name: Beyond Control (TheChriggu, Erdbeerjam, ichbinliese, Daniel R., David Schwab, mondeeeas)
name_original: Beyond Control (TheChriggu, Erdbeerjam, ichbinliese, Daniel R., David Schwab, mondeeeas)
description:
Robby crash landed on his way between the two space station on a alien planet to earth. And even worst Robby is now longer in the shape to fix his situation himself. 



The only hope is to use the communication line between two space stations. 
That means you work together with another colleague. 



Control Robby`s speed or change his walking direction. 
And don`t you forget: 

You can`t communicate with your colleague...
But every other move is his control...
Good luck!

Created for the 

Extra thanks to
Stefan Sebekow for his gorgeous sountrack!

Note:

While all the code controlling the gameplay was written by us, this project uses Photon for networking. 

https://www.photonengine.com/en/Photon
